SongLyrics.JpnStr: 空[そら]の声[こえ]が 聞[き]きたくて
SongLyrics.EngStr: I want to hear the voice of the sky

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 風[かぜ]の声[こえ]に 耳[みみ]すませ
SongLyrics.EngStr: I want to listen to the voice of the wind

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 海[うみ]の声[こえ]が 知[し]りたくて
SongLyrics.EngStr: I want to know the voice of the sea

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]の声[こえ]を 探[さが]してる
SongLyrics.EngStr: I'm searching for your voice

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 会[あ]えない そう思[おも]うほど に
SongLyrics.EngStr: The more I think that I can't see you

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 会[あ]いたい が大[おお]きくなってゆく
SongLyrics.EngStr: I want to see you more and more

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 川[かわ]の呟[つぶや]き 山[やま]の囁[ささや]き
SongLyrics.EngStr: The murmur of the river, the whisper of the mountains

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]の声[こえ]の様[よう]に 感[かん]じるんだ
SongLyrics.EngStr: I feel it like your voice

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 目[め]を閉[と]じれば 聞[き]こえてくる
SongLyrics.EngStr: When I close my eyes, I can hear

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]のコロコロした 笑[わら]い声[こえ]
SongLyrics.EngStr: The sound of your laugh

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 声[こえ]に出[だ]せば 届[とど]きそうで 今日[きょう]も 歌[うた]ってる
SongLyrics.EngStr: I feel like I can reach you if I say it out loud, so I'm singing again today

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 海[うみ]の声[こえ]にのせて
SongLyrics.EngStr: To the sound of the sea

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 空[そら]の声[こえ]が 聞[き]きたくて
SongLyrics.EngStr: I want to hear the voice of the sky

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 風[かぜ]の声[こえ]に 耳[みみ]すませ
SongLyrics.EngStr: I want to listen to the voice of the wind

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 海[うみ]の声[こえ]が 知[し]りたくて
SongLyrics.EngStr: I want to know the voice of the sea

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]の声[こえ]を 探[さが]してる
SongLyrics.EngStr: I'm looking for your voice

SongLyrics.JpnStr: たとえ僕[ぼく]が お祖父[じい]さんになっても ここで 歌[うた]ってる
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even if I become a grandfather, I'll still be here singing

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]だけを想[おも]って
SongLyrics.EngStr: Thinking only of you

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 海[うみ]の声[こえ]よ 風[かぜ]の声[こえ]よ
SongLyrics.EngStr: The voice of the sea, the voice of the wind

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 空[そら]の声[こえ]よ 太陽[たいよう]の声[こえ]よ
SongLyrics.EngStr: The voice of the sky, The voice of the sun

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 川[かわ]の声[こえ]よ 山[やま]の声[こえ]よ
SongLyrics.EngStr: The voice of the river The voice of the mountains

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 僕[ぼく]の声[こえ]を 乗[の]せてゆけ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Let my voice carry you away

ListVocab: お祖父さん-おじいさん
